## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Design system update
- [ ] Refactoring

## Design System Checklist
- [ ] All cards use `<GlassCard>` component (not raw `bg-white/[0.03]`)
- [ ] All buttons use `<Button>` component (not raw button styles)
- [ ] All badges use `<Badge>` component (no colored dots)
- [ ] Page headers use `<PageHeader>` with serif title
- [ ] Sections use `mb-16` spacing (64px between major sections)
- [ ] Inputs/selects use `bg-white/5` (secondary surface - allowed)
- [ ] No raw `bg-white/[0.03]` classes (use GlassCard instead)
- [ ] Empty states have editorial CTAs (not generic "No data" text)
- [ ] Tables/list rows have editorial density (not cramped)
- [ ] No colored dots or dashboard kit artifacts

## Testing
- [ ] Build passes
- [ ] Lint passes
- [ ] Visual QA: Page matches landing page aesthetic
- [ ] Checked on mobile (if applicable)
